title: Intro to Comp Security
description: Introductory topics in computer security are presented with an emphasis on fundamental security primitives and current security challenges facing society. Credit not awarded for both ECE 4115 and ECE 4112.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 4110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 3251 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
